Correspondent Marco Chown Oved in Abidjan said Alassane Ouattara 's announcement has`` sown confusion at the ports'' in the world's biggest cocoa producer. Exporters are still loading cocoa beans onto ships, Chown Oved told RFI, although these exports were all registered and paid for before Alassane Ouattara 's call for a ban.
